non_compliant.section: ROE collects, processes, or uses the basic personal information
non_compliant.legal provisions: Definitions of personal data,  Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly define what 'basic personal information' entails, according to GDPR definitions of personal data. It should also specify the legal basis for processing this data (e.g., consent, contract, legitimate interest) and provide details about data retention periods.

non_compliant.section: provided by the corporate sustainability website of ROE (hereinafter referred to as “this website”) through this privacy policy
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify what information is collected, how it's collected (e.g., cookies), and the purpose of processing. If data is collected from other sources, this needs to be explicitly stated along with the legal basis.

non_compliant.section: If you do not provide your personal information voluntarily, ROE will not collect your basic personal information through this website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent, Right to object
non_compliant.amend: While this addresses consent, it doesn't cover situations where processing might be lawful without consent (e.g., legitimate interest). The policy should also mention the right to withdraw consent and the right to object to processing.

non_compliant.section: In addition, the privacy policy only applies to the basic personal information collected by ROE through this website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Records of processing activities
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clarify if data is shared with third parties and for what purpose. It should also mention the data subject's rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.) and how to exercise them. Information about the data controller and their contact details should be included.

non_compliant.section: When you use relevant services on this website, this website may request to keep your true personal basic information, in order to provide faster and high-quality information and services.
non_compliant.legal provisions:
Lawfulness of processing: Processing is only lawful if there is a legal basis for it, such as consent or legitimate interest. 
Legitimate interest cannot be used if it overrides the fundamental rights of the data subject. 
Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the legal basis for processing personal data, such as explicit consent or legitimate interest. If relying on legitimate interest, conduct a balancing test and provide information about it. Ensure consent is freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous, and provide an easy way to withdraw consent.

non_compliant.section: In addition, when you are using this website, our server will keep relevant records automatically, such as IP address or use time, and ROE may compile such records as data for research.
non_compliant.legal provisions:
Purpose limitation: Data can only be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes. 
Storage limitation: Data should be kept only as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected. 
Lawfulness of processing: Processing is only lawful if there is a legal basis for it, such as consent or legitimate interest. 
Transparency: Data subjects must be informed about the processing of their data.
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific and legitimate purposes for collecting IP addresses and usage data. State the retention period for this data. If using it for research, ensure it is anonymized or pseudonymized as much as possible and provide a legal basis for processing. Be transparent about these practices in the privacy policy.

non_compliant.section: ...until you raise a request to ROE for the termination of the storage directly or until the law requires termination of the storage of said information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') - General rule, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') - Exceptions
non_compliant.amend: The policy should be amended to clarify that individuals have a right to request deletion of their data (right to be forgotten) without undue delay, and ROE must comply unless there's a legitimate and lawful reason to retain the data as per Article 17(3).

non_compliant.section: ROE reserves the right to add, revise, or delete this “Privacy Policy” at any time, and will make revisions without prior notice.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to be informed about the processing of their data, including any changes to privacy policies. Changes to a privacy policy must be communicated to data subjects in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language.  While policies can be amended, notice must be provided before the changes take effect.
non_compliant.amend: This statement should be amended to reflect that material changes to the privacy policy require prior notice to users.  Consider specifying a method for providing notice, such as email or website notifications, and a reasonable timeframe for users to review the changes before they take effect.

non_compliant.section: ROE shall indicate the last update date on the page of the Privacy Policy of this website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While indicating the last update date is good practice, it does not fully address the requirement of providing clear and timely notice about changes to data processing activities.
non_compliant.amend: In addition to displaying the last update date, proactively inform users about material changes to the policy.  This could involve a brief summary of the changes and a link to the updated policy.

non_compliant.section: It is advised that you check the date each time before browsing through this website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Placing the onus solely on users to check for updates is insufficient to meet the transparency and information requirements.
non_compliant.amend: Instead of solely advising users to check for updates, implement a mechanism to proactively notify them of material changes. This ensures users are explicitly informed about how their data is being handled.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Information provided to the data subject - transparency and modalities
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the identity and contact details of the data controller, including their name and contact information. This information should be easily accessible and understandable for the data subject.
